sentences.en: A ditch diverted water from the rill into the fields.
sentences.cn: 一条沟渠把水从河里引向田间.

sentences.en: By the side of the rill.
From a practical standpoint, rill erosion forms small channels.
sentences.cn: 从实用的观点看, 细沟侵蚀能形成很小的渠槽.

sentences.en: Rill erosion is one of important erosion manners slope, while it is difficult to study quantitatively.
sentences.cn: 细沟侵蚀是土壤侵蚀的重要方式之一, 但定量研究困难很大.

sentences.en: Sediment regime rill erosion process was always detachment - transport.
sentences.cn: 坡面细沟侵蚀过程以侵蚀 — 搬运过程为主.

sentences.en: Stands nearby murmur the rill, listens to the running water to wash your memory.
sentences.cn: 站在潺潺的小溪旁, 听流水洗涤你的记忆.

sentences.en: The best little scrub by the side of the rill;
sentences.cn: 做溪流边最棒的一棵小树;

sentences.en: The maternal love is a rill, when the brook brook rivulet moistens our heart ~.
sentences.cn: 母爱是一条小溪, 如涓涓细流无时滋润我们的心田~.

sentences.en: The surface shows deep rill - like folds.
sentences.cn: 表面有深沟槽 状 起伏褶皱.

sentences.en: The water in this rill is very clean.
sentences.cn: 这条小溪里的水非常清澈.

sentences.en: There is a spare toilet rill in the bathroom cupboard.
sentences.cn: 浴室的柜橱里有一卷备用的手纸.

phrases.tran_cn: 细沟侵蚀，小沟冲蚀；带状沟蚀；细流冲蚀

trans.tran_cn: 小河，小溪，（地表或岩石表面）冲蚀而成的水沟
